meanings.sent1: The rabbit will scoot away from danger.
meanings.sent2: I need to scoot to catch the bus on time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to scoot up the tree for a better view.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the leaves scoot across the pavement.
meanings.sent5: She had to scoot through the crowded market to find her friend.

meanings.definition: A quick, hasty movement or action
meanings.sent1: The mouse made a little scoot across the floor.
meanings.sent2: With a scoot, he grabbed the last cookie from the jar.
meanings.sent3: The child's scoot towards the ice cream truck was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The sudden scoot of the cat startled the birds in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The scoot of the skateboard echoed in the empty parking lot.
